import React from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Button, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Navigation = ({ user, onLogout }) => { const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const isAdmin = user?.role === 'admin'; const handleLogout = () => { onLogout(); navigate('/login'); }; return ( {/* Brand/Logo Section */}
TutoMart {isAdmin ? 'Admin Dashboard' : 'Support Portal'}
{/* Left Navigation Links */}
Dashboard Tickets {isAdmin && ( <> Management Users Employees )}
{/* Right Section - User Info */}
{user?.name?.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}
{user?.name}
{user?.role === 'admin' ? 'Administrator' : 'Support Staff'}
{user?.name}
{user?.email} Dashboard My Tickets Logout {/* Quick Actions for Admin */} {isAdmin && ( )} {/* Mobile Logout Button */}
); }; export default Navigation;
